name: apis.io
description: APIs.io os an experimental API Search service to help discover APIs on the web. The service uses the APIs.json proposed discovery format. To find APIs type your request in the search box. To get listed follow the instructions in the FAQ. The Search engine is also open source so you can run your own copy.
